extends: age-of-empires
files:
- script: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Age%20of%20Empires/clean.sh
- updt: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Age%20of%20Empires/aoe1_update_1.0c_multi.zip
game:
  args: /r:0
  exe: drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: winxp
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/tmp/
    file: updt
- insert-disc:
    requires: game/empiresx.exe
- input_menu:
    description: 'Please select your CD language:'
    id: VERSION
    options:
    - aoeinst.exe: English or other
    - aoesetup.exe: German
    preselect: aoeinst.exe
- task:
    args: /desktop=ROR,1024x780 $DISC/$INPUT_VERSION
    description: Installing Rise of Rome extension...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/explorer.exe
    name: wineexec
- write_config:
    data:
      target:
        cdvol0: 0
        codepage0: 0
        coord0: 3
        country0: 0
        dflag0: 0
        dflagb0: 0
        expert: 1
        fakec0: None
        faked0: None
        filterid0: 0
        flag0: 673185825
        flagg0: 1207959568
        flagh0: 22
        flagi0: 138444804
        flagj0: 4224
        flagk0: 65536
        flagl0: 1114112
        flagm0: 65536
        flagn0: 17825796
        flago0: 0
        flagp0: 8192
        flagq0: 0
        icon0: 
        initresh0: 600
        initresw0: 800
        initts0: 0
        initx0: 0
        inity0: 0
        lang0: 0
        launchpath0: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Age of Empires\Empiresx.exe
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxfps0: 0
        maxres0: -1
        maxx0: 0
        maxy0: 0
        minx0: 0
        miny0: 0
        module0: None
        monitorid0: -1
        notes0: None
        opengllib0: None
        path0: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Age of Empires\empiresx.exe
        posx0: 50
        posy0: 50
        registry0: None
        renderer0: 3
        scanline0: 0
        sizx0: 800
        sizy0: 600
        slowratio0: 2
        startfolder0: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Games\Age of Empires\
        swapeffect0: 0
        tflag0: 0
        title0: Age of Empires - Rise of Rome
        ver0: 0
        winver0: 0
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.ini
- input_menu:
    description: 'Please precise your CD language:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - en: English
    - fr: French
    - ge: German
    - it: italian
    - sp: Spanish
    - po: Portuguese
    preselect: en
- chmodx: scriptclean
- execute:
    args: $INPUT_LANG "$DISC" ror
    file: scriptclean
- task:
    app: win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
